text: The Kia Venga is a car produced by Kia from 2009 to the year 2019, basically a decade. It is based on the Hyundai i20 and Kia Soul's platform. The Venga is available with 1.4 and 1.6 litre petrol engines with 66 kW/90 hp and 92 kW/125 hp respectively, a 1.4 litre turbo diesel engine in 55 kW/75 hp and 66 kW/90 hp versions, and a 1.6 litre turbo diesel engine in 85 kW/115 hp and 94 kW/128 hp versions. Venga Category:2000s automobiles Category:2010s automobiles
title: Kia Venga
